item.title: Master lamp and pure lamp (Good for pk server)
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

eclipse rsps:

were angry at you because you have posted 5+ tutorials that do not help at all. There just random crap. Most of us think that you think posting tutorials and flooding the Server Help thread are going to gain you some kind of reputation here. So either post a tutorial that will help somebody or dont post at all.

It may help for someone who search for it?
Like the polypore one (that i have removed)
Was a fine base for it.

I admit that the Hallucinating one is shit but i was bored.
This one i made for someone in server help and i thought of posting it here for anyone who may need it.
And the comp cape one is a base aswell for the emote and i saw some threads of people requesting the comp cape models.

I don’t get why everyone is angry about that. But i won’t post any tutorials now
Only if i think its reaaallllllyyyy damn good.

Anyways sorry if i made u angry didn’t meaned to.

Read full topic
